name: Don't Frogget
description:
Don't Frogget is a visual novel based game for the Narrative Driven Jam #2! 

The theme was to have an unreliable narrator. Project duration was 1 week.

This was my first time making a visual novel game and definitely had fun making it!

I really wish I had more time for the game(noticed a few typos as well, oof) but it's better than nothing, right?

Still, let me know what you think! Enjoy!
